name: Souradeep Bera

experience.title: Student Member
experience.description: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Guest Lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship to meet our objective.
experience.description_html: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Guest Lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship to meet our objective.
experience.company: Students'​ Alumni Cell, Office of Alumni Affairs, IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Data Analytics Intern
experience.description: •Built automation models to read and output stored procedures from MySQL using python and extract text informationfrom scanned images or photos (Optical Character Recognition using Tesseract)• Built a biLSTM neural network to perform multi-class classification to identify whether customer reviews are positive,negative or neutral. Identified glitches in products and services using sentiment analysis.• Built a siamese neural network to extract sentence embeddings tasks using pre-trained transformer word embedding (BERT family)for semantic similarity to perform clustering on customer reviews and extract topics.• Created dashboards and reports for data visualization and implemented data scripting using Qlik Sense.
experience.description_html: •Built automation models to read and output stored procedures from MySQL using python and extract text informationfrom scanned images or photos (Optical Character Recognition using Tesseract)• Built a biLSTM neural network to perform multi-class classification to identify whether customer reviews are positive,negative or neutral. Identified glitches in products and services using sentiment analysis.• Built a siamese neural network to extract sentence embeddings tasks using pre-trained transformer word embedding (BERT family)for semantic similarity to perform clustering on customer reviews and extract topics.• Created dashboards and reports for data visualization and implemented data scripting using Qlik Sense.

recommendations: Ajanta Dey “Souradeep was part of the Student Alumni Committee (SAC) which was instrumental in organizing the 17th Alumni reunion at KGP. The event was a roaring success and was attended by over 150 people from across the world. Souradeep has been extremely responsive in addressing queries regarding the event and was responsible for the managing the transportation during the event. The commitment shown by Souradeep along with the other members of SAC was exemplary and this made the event for the Alumni hassle free and memorable. We were extremely impressed by the organizational capabilities shown by the SAC members. Kudos to Souradeep and the SAC team!!”
